description:
Grab your keys—it’s time to hit the road! The Garvan Shirt for men was designed to be the perfect travel partner: stylish enough with its double chest pockets and classic silhouette to fit in anywhere, and boasting technical features that make it a hit everywhere.
What features you say? Well, let’s start with UV protection—a must on those day-long adventures. It also offers plenty of stretch, delivering comfort as you move. Who said you can’t have it all?
name: Prana Garvan SS Shirt - Mens
